items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with improvements and updates for compatibility and performance across multiple platforms, including Windows, Linux, and macOS.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.11 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: Documentation updates for elasticache, newer model support in Amazon Bedrock Flows, Reasoning Content support fields, removal of elastic-inference client, and other improvements.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: The Azure CLI 2.69.0 release includes updates and bug fixes to improve reliability and performance.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Resolved language server crash and deployment failures, and released Deployment Pane as a stable feature with minor bug fixes and enhancements.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Reuse worker threads for bru file parsing and update forms to capture better details. Various bug fixes and improvements to enhance stability and usability.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version 1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07. The summary of changes are: Added new Lua API unicode.char() for Unicode codepoints. Introduced a clink-diagnostics-output command for troubleshooting. Fixed a potential crash if console dimensions were misconfigured.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and stability improvements. It continues to ensure compatibility with supported platforms and database systems. Free and open source, it is available for download from official sources including GitHub.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: This release includes Docker 25+ compatibility, snap installation instructions, and several bug fixes while upgrading dependencies for security.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: The latest release introduces the ability to create multi-node Kubernetes clusters, provides independent updates for Docker Compose and related tools, and includes various bug fixes such as resolving container creation issues with Enhanced Container Isolation enabled.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: This update includes the latest fixes and enhancements for the .NET SDK, improving stability and functionality. It is recommended for all users to upgrade to this stable release.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to improve functionality and enhance performance for building and running .NET applications.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Updated to draw.io core 26.0.16 with Electron 34.2.0. Includes all changes from previous versions for improved functionality.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures to enhance usability.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 includes updates from the 7.1 release branch, providing new features, bug fixes, and library version updates.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version 2.48.1.windows.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: Git for Windows v2.48.1 includes Git v2.48.1 and several updates, such as using the Windows-native HTTPS transport backend, MSYS2 runtime based on Cygwin v3.5.7, and phased-out 32-bit installer support. It resolves issues like installation blocks on unsupported Windows versions and fixes credential helper errors. This release marks an improvement in functionality and security.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: Introduced new commands such as `glab ci cancel` and features like sorting of MRs, along with update checks and improved documentation. Multiple fixes were applied, including better handling of CI dependencies and user-friendly errors. Enhancements were made to commands like label deletion and variable management.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17T10:50:07Z. The summary of changes are: This release merges 'release-0-22-0' into 'master' with improvements and refinements based on the latest updates.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20T03:20:06Z. The summary of changes are: Updated the CHANGELOG for v17.9.0 with various adjustments and improvements.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on N/A. The summary of changes are: The latest stable version introduces updates to improve performance, enhance module support, and ensure greater compatibility with various operating systems and architectures.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: Includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package along with bug fixes for the compiler and the Go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version go1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Go 1.23.6 introduces security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, along with bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release focused on bug fixes and performance improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the best experience. Join the discussion in Kubernetes Slack for questions, PRs, and more.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces features like a Filter Gallery for easier filter selection, modular and improved grids, and faster image clipping with the Shape Builder. It also includes enhancements like a unified font browser, customizable handles, and support for Affinity Designer File Import. Additionally, the release offers over 500 new icons, updated templates, and numerous bug fixes.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: This release improves dependency syncing for Maven projects, enhances screen reader detection on Windows startup, and fixes custom toolbar icon display issues after IDE restarts.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes performance improvements and bug fixes for enhanced usability and reliability.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: The release addresses security issues, introduces CLI enhancements like better background color support and inline script passing, and improves memory handling and JSON parsing.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes patch updates and stability improvements for version 1.32.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: Make is a tool to automate building executables and files from source code using makefiles. The latest release focuses on streamlining dependency handling and optimizing file generation processes. It supports multiple programming languages and system architectures.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 is the latest stable release, recommended for all users. It includes the newest features and bug fixes. This version requires JDK 8 or above to execute.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and updates, such as upgrading the conda-anaconda-tos version to 0.1.2.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes performance improvements and bug fixes to enhance stability and reliability of the platform.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes minor bug fixes and performance improvements ensuring stability for production environments.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release Node.js 18.20.7 introduces optimizations and updates to improve stability and performance. It builds upon prior releases with enhancements in modules and bug fixes. This release is recommended for production use.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest updates, fixes, and features for Node.js version 20 in its stable branch. It aims to improve performance and provide critical bug fixes. Users are advised to update to ensure compatibility and security.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes various updates and bug fixes providing improved stability and performance.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Version 8.7.7 fixes a regression in v8.7.6 related to SCN_MODIFIED notification events and introduces the new API NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS for improved plugin compatibility.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes client tools for OKD with preconfigured openshift-install binary, upgrade notes for existing clusters, and verification of archive integrity is recommended.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release updates to IANA time zone data 2024b, improves historical data for various regions, and introduces new timestamp and thread debugging options for enhanced logging functionality.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates like IANA time zone data for 2024b and various bug fixes. Security vulnerabilities have been addressed, and important updates to string concatenation and process argument handling were made. Users are advised to update to ensure compatibility and security.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes the IANA Time Zone Database 2024b updates, various bug fixes, and improved windows ProcessBuilder handling for command-line arguments with space characters.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on N/A. The summary of changes are: The latest stable General Availability (GA) release of JDK 8 which includes critical updates and fixes.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes build and packaging improvements, updated .NET SDK, and enhancements to the Microsoft.PowerShell.PSResourceGet module.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This latest stable release of PuTTY includes updates and fixes for enhanced reliability. Users are encouraged to download and try the latest version for improved performance. This version is available for various architectures including 32-bit, 64-bit, and ARM.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes bug fixes and performance improvements, ensuring stability and reliability. It is the latest release in the Python 3.13 series. This version is recommended for all users for enhanced support.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on Dec. 3, 2024. The summary of changes are: This release includes security fixes and minor bug improvements to enhance overall stability and compatibility.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This security-focused update addresses important fixes and improvements in the Python 3.11 series.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes and improvements for better stability and performance.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: Python 3.9.21 includes security updates and bug fixes to enhance stability and performance.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.5 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.5 fixes the Go to Class feature, introduces new in-house AI models for C# cloud completion, and adds support for Anthropic's Claude models in AI Assistant for enhanced code suggestions.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated multiple localizations including Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch. Fixed issues with Move Left/Right commands, extra color button, and recording message typo.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed logging of dynamic variables in verbose mode, added TASK_DIR special variable, and resolved critical bugs causing concurrent map writes.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.10.0 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes major enhancements and bug fixes for improved performance and reliability. For full details, refer to the official changelog.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The January 2025 Recovery 2 update addresses key issues. For further details, visit the complete release notes on Updates at code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 is now stable, featuring a rewritten console hosting implementation for better performance and Sixel support. It introduces support for grapheme clusters and improved compatibility for Unicode characters. Additionally, a new UI for pop-ups in cooked read applications like CMD and Python has been added.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This release resolves various bugs, including issues with ALT-F4 behavior and plugin displays, enhances folder comparison functionality, and updates translations for multiple languages. It is recommended as the latest stable version.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on not provided. The summary of changes are: The current stable release of Wireshark is 4.4.5, which supersedes all previous releases. It includes the latest stable release of Npcap for live packet capture. Additional system requirements can be found in the User's Guide.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version 4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Create parent directories when --split-exp is used and bumped dependencies.
